Class Seat

java.lang.Object
moblima.Entity.Seat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoupleSeat, EliteSeat, RegularSeat, UltimaSeat
public class Seat extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a Seat in a Cinema. Implements Serializable.
